About Home Raised Cairns

About Home Raised Cairns

Hello, my name is Dean Krotzer. I am a software developer that lives with a few wonderful Cairn Terriers that mean a lot to me. They make me and my kids laugh and smile every day. They have helped my kids with more medical problems so much so that every adult cairn has an ADA service dog registration card! My Adult Cairns sleeps in bed with me and my kids every night. These Carins are not just dogs to us, they are family members! So much of a family member they even have our last name their AKC pedigree! I have spent countless hours researching the best/worst foods, treats, training techniques, vaccinations, etc. I do my best to share knowledge about what I have learned about this amazing breed, without you having to research yourself with all the hours on the computer. Hopefully, with my guidance, you can continue to have the happiest and healthiest puppy it could be. I have never met a dog breed I did not like yet. I believe all breeds are amazing! I chose Cairns for my family because they are hypoallergenic smaller in size, lower shedding, great with kids, love to travel, loyal. I especially love how they retain their cuteness as they age into adults.

A little more about cairn terriers The breed

Cairn Terriers are great little dogs that are always ready for an adventure big or small. They are ready to jump into a kayak, take a hike up a mountain, or go for a stroll through your local park. These little dogs are doers and need to be at your side whether it's snuggling up and watching a movie, working hard sleeping at your feet(while you do all the work), or riding in the car keeping you company. Cairns are very versatile dogs for many different lifestyles, they are great with children, other dogs/animals, and not only need attention they crave it. Not only are Cairn terriers cute and cuddly, but these little dogs also used to be fierce little hunters of fox, badgers, otters, and other small rodents, and many royal families preferred the terrier breeds as they helped keep their houses or castle free from pesky intruders.

Why Home Raised Cairns

When you buy a puppy from home raised cairns, you not just buying a dog that was raised in a home. Your buying from someone that won't even start something if it isn't done right, in the best way possible way. I strive to ensure a superior experience an quality. Buying from Home Raised Cairns is buying a higher standard Cairn. I always use the best options for vaccines and never let cost affect a decision in providing the most optimal care. I dedicated hours daily to giving my cairns the time and attention they deserve. I have years of research on what to feed. I truly care about all animals and sometimes joke about wanting to be around animals more than people.üòÅ


); } } export default AboutHomeRaised;
